ygData.subject: The Minions stir
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Please keep in mind I am using the minion description as is posted on Wiki. In the depths of space, on the far side of earth s moon, hidden from sensors

OOC: Please keep in mind I am using the minion description as is 
posted on=
 Wiki. 

In the depths of space, on the far side of earth's moon, hidden fr=
om 
sensors and prying optics a small but powerful warp distortion 
appears=
 for a moment and then vanishes without a trace, leaving 
something behind =
=85.  

Swift and agile, shadows appear around the dark and silent moon; 
s=
ensor ghosts, appearing for a moment, but then gone again before 
they can =
be locked on to. Quickly they descend to the surface of the 
moon like some=
 dark plague upon an unsuspecting victim. Many seem to 
disappear beneath t=
he surface, while others scour the surface, moving 
to and fro over the app=
arently dead surface of earth's moon. 

Two of the shadows break away from =
the rest, shift into a humanoid 
form and land. "Is this the correct place?=
 If he was here we would 
have found him by now!"

"Yes." Said the other fi=
gure, his figure is sleek and agile, purple 
framed with silver highlights.=
 "Have patience. No doubt he has just 
hidden his signature. We know where =
to look though."

The first figure nodded as the two continued on, his form=
 looking 
winged as the shadows played over his blue and white form. 

Befo=
re long they came to a large set of doors, set into a 
mountainside. Doors =
constructed in such a way that they would be 
hidden if they were not stand=
ing open as if beckoning the duo inside. 

Without a glance the larger purp=
le figure stepped inside, even as the 
winged one hesitated. "Come." Said t=
he first in calm confident 
tones. "He is here. I can feel him." The other =
followed, looks of 
both fear and confidence fighting a war on his metallic=
ally bearded 
face. 

Great vaulting caverns greeted the two as they walked=
; ancient stone, 
unworked and yet beautiful in its own way. "He is here, V=
orpal is 
here." The winged figure's voice is confidence and almost aggress=
ion 
as he spoke.

"Yes." Said the other figure, his steps measured and con=
fident. "As 
Unicron had already told us." Quickly they emerged into a larg=
e 
chamber filled with dim lights and probing shadows. Moving to the 
cente=
r of the chamber, to the front of what could only be a throne 
they stood f=
inally before the presence of Vorpal, Leader of the 
minions in this area. =


"My lord." Said the larger purple armored figure as he knelt. "I am 
Cycl=
onus." He gestured behind him as the other also followed 
suit, "and this i=
s Scourge. We have been sent by Mighty Unicron to 
aid you in the eradicati=
on of all his enemies." Cyclonus bowed his 
head. "What are your orders?"

=
OOC: Please note that this is NOT the Cyclonus and Scourge that 
previously=
 appeared on this website. I note that they have been 
absent since about 2=
001. So you can think of these as clones or total 
reformats of them from U=
nicron. But since they have been gone for so 
long, and they are characters=
 that belong to Hasbro or who ever, I 
hope no one objects to their use. Th=
ey will not have the memories of 
those that already appeared. I can rename=
 them if it makes it easier 
for the group as a whole.
